TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Gbayang, title = Gbayang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gbayang} }

S.FORM: = Gbayang = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Wanjungsyang ka alang Gbayang. 120 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 368 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 359 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 9 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Truku 88%, Amis 1%, Tayal 2%, Kebalan 1%, ni rahuq na o 5%. Nniqan alang Nyusan Skanki nsgan Maribasi alang Cyeyn-cing. Pusu klegan seejiq nealang Truku. Djiyun kari Kari Truku.

= Gbayang = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Wanjongsyang ka alang Gbayang. 120 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 368 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 359 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 9 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Troko 88%, Amis 1%, Tayal 2%, Kebalan 1%, ni rahoq na o 5%. Nniqan alang Nyosan Skanki nsgan Maribasi alang Cyeyn-cing. Poso klegan seejiq nealang Troko. Djiyon kari Kari Troko.
